channel.title: Maria Eril on Allwellbeing
channel.description: Recent content in Maria Eril on Allwellbeing

item.title: What behavior should be excluded by adults in order to develop leadership in children
item.description: Today, children from a very young age observe a huge number of examples in social networks, when people who seem to have made no effort to become famous and famous become famous. Moreover, they may not have the qualities that are commonly believed needed to manage and maintain their popularity. Quick and easy popularity often ends just as quickly, and a person can find himself on his own, without the necessary education and without having formed the qualities necessary for adulthood.
